replies.body:
I just realised we don't have a shit-based champion.

I mean... Could be cool, no ?...

...

_cough_
Or we could give Zac a new skin. Never mind, those are called chromas
{{champion:266}} But we do have shit champions.
No no this is how https://derpicdn.net/img/view/2016/10/28/1283130__safe_twilight+sparkle_equestria+girls_screencap_cute_animated_spike_tongue+out_human+twilight_twiabetes.gif
It really is. Turning the MLP group into demented furries kind of lost my respect for bronies. The original ones were tolerable.
Pardon? mind filling me in more on the whole original one and turning MLP into Demented furries

Sure, old My Little Pony when they were ponies was **ok**, not good or bad, but ok.

The - what is it called? - Equestria girls? I don't know. Those are unbearable.

You know, that post makes it seem like...

You watch MLP.
Is there a problem with that

Nah...

It's just that it isnt...

_Puffs out chest_ 

Manly, is all.

http://orig05.deviantart.net/3ed7/f/2014/130/7/d/mlp_425_426__twilight_s_kingdom__1080p_hd__00_by_knorberthu-d7hv035.gif LASERS https://media.giphy.com/media/qvzxC3yWmb8FG/giphy.gif FEAR THE GIRLY PURPLE PONY

Your ponies are no match for manliness!
https://media.giphy.com/media/26hisuyB2ms3MUdgc/giphy.gif?noredirect

The manliness sensor has flatlined!
We need some JoJo in this thread, now!

It's not enough! Gurren Lagann!

**Arkham Knight!**

That should do it.
ANSWER THE QUESTION OF WHAT DO YOU MEAN DEMENTED FURRIES

They literally look like overzealous furries/cosplayers.

There was literally 0 reasons to make them humanized.

At least 0 reasons for the intended audience...

> [{quoted}](name=Insanity Song,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=c4yojGjP,comment-id=00020000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2016-11-18T22:06:33.685+0000)
>
> Well that had me giggling

It's nothing personal.

I just deeply dislike overly girly shows and the clear male fanservice MLPEG provides.

I mean, it was easy enough for people to make certain art when they were just ponies, but now...
(Moved)
Well that had me giggling
Ponies are actual creatures. Unicorns are mythical creatures, as are pegasi. I don't know _what_ those **things** are, but they're not natural.
I still do not see a problem
On a side note just got halfway through S2 of jojo loooove it
OKay fair enough you dont like EQ girls but what was that about demented furries?
More like make a thread and then immediately delete it and repost it
Fat fingered

I get this, usually from mid laners who are being stomped (it cant be your fault).

Stomped midlaner: "(insert ahri/anivia/taliyah/aurelion) is a zero skill shit champ, all click no aim, fuck you noob". Much lols was had by all.
